verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Saved by His pow'r, by His pow'r divine, Saved to new life, to new life sublime! Life now is sweet and my joy is complete, For I'm saved, saved, saved.{/lang-eng}

verse.lines: {lang-eng}When poor and needy and all alone, In love He said to me, "Come unto Me and I'll lead you home To live with Me eternally."{/lang-eng}
